name: This is how space works, right?
name_original: This is how space works, right?
description:
This game is in space. Made for a small game jam in nothern germany. Clocks don't work in space!

Programming, VFX and Gamedesign - Dennis Diekmann

Art and Music - Kristina Wassiljew

Musik is copyrighted by Kristina Wassiljew
